name: The Skeleton King (sherwinkc)
description:
Word has come of a great threat in a distant land. Blood and bones tarnish the once lush, green landscape. A lowly wanderer searches the forest dark for the unholy truth. He must gather orbs and find the keys, to purge the land of evil... 

...and end The Skeleton King. 

Mouse & Keyboard & Controller supported (known issue - some menu tabs are not selectable on controller).

Controls: 
Move: LS / A, D
Attack: X / Mouse L
Jump: A / Space
Dash Roll: B / Mouse R
Interact: Y / E
Super: LB + RB / Q
Upgrades: Start / P or Esc
